file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-14-03-04 - CONFIG-2 - LAVATORY SMOKE-DETECTOR HORN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LAVATORY SMOKE-DETECTOR HORN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the lavatory smoke detector horn. B. The lavatory smoke detector horn is installed in the aft section of the passenger cabin, zone 264. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) LAVATORY SMOKE-DETECTOR HORN - 26-14-03-000-801-A EMB-135 REMOVAL ACFT MODEL(S) LAVATORY SMOKE-DETECTOR HORN - 26-14-03-400-801-A EMB-135 INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 26-14-03 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-14-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 2. LAVATORY SMOKE-DETECTOR HORN - REMOVAL A. General (1) This section gives the procedures for the removal of the lavatory smoke detector horn. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-802-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the "LAVATORY SMOKE DET" circuit breaker, and attach a "DO-NOT-CLOSE" tag to it (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/LAVATORY/SMOKE DET). (2) Remove the last passenger cabin ceiling panel (AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-802-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Identify the wires (8). (2) Remove the bolts (1) that attach the terminal lugs (9) on the chime assy (7). (3) Remove the bolts (6), tooth washer (5), flat washer (4) and bracket (2) from the ceiling panel (REF.). (4) Remove the nut (3) and chime assy (7) from the bracket (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 26-14-03 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 Lavatory Smoke-Detector Horn - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A B DET. A 8. WIRE (2) 9. TERMINAL LUG (2) 7. CHIME ASSY 1. BOLT (2) 6. BOLT (2) 5. TOOTH WASHER (2) 2. BRACKET 4. FLAT WASHER (2) 3. NUT CEILING PANEL (REF.) DET. B 145AMM260127.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 26-14-03 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-14-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-135 3. LAVATORY SMOKE-DETECTOR HORN - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the lavatory smoke detector horn. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 26-14-00-700-802-A/500 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Install the nut (3) and chime assy (7) on the bracket (2). (2) Install the bolts (6), tooth washers (5), flat washers (4) and the bracket (2) on the ceiling panel (REF.). (3) Install the bolts (1) and terminal lugs (9) on the chime assy (7). Make sure that the polarity is correct. (4) Remove the identification from the wires (8). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Install the last passenger cabin ceiling panel (AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-802-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 26-14-03 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the "DO-NOT-CLOSE" tag and close the "LAVATORY SMOKE DET" circuit breaker (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/LAVATORY/SMOKE DET). (3) Do the Operational Check of the Lavatory Smoke-Detection System (AMM TASK 26-14-00-700-802-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 26-14-03 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
